ComicInfo.Summary:
The final issue in the first-ever Bob's Burgers miniseries, featuring five original stories of the Belcher family! In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Tina finds a familiar face; Bob cultivates a list of literary classics; Louise tries to shed light on a Boyz 4 Now mystery while denying having any interest in them whatsoever; Linda imagines an alternate universe; and Gene presents a musical set at Robot College.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Hector Reynoso & Anthony Aguinaldo | 1 | RI | Retailer Incentive "Virgin" Cover | Hector Reynoso & Anthony Aguinaldo | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-01 00:36:43. [CVDB473657]
ComicInfo.Writer: Chad Brewster, Jeff Drake, Justin Hook, Mike Olsen, Rachel Hastings
ComicInfo.Penciller: Frank Forte, Hector Reynoso, Robin Brigstocke, Steven Theis, Tony Gennaro, Tyler Garrison
ComicInfo.Inker: Frank Forte, Hector Reynoso, Robin Brigstocke, Steven Theis, Tony Gennaro, Tyler Garrison
ComicInfo.Characters: Bob Belcher, Gene Belcher, Linda Belcher, Louise Belcher, Tina Belcher
